#summary Internal representation of fuzzy objects
#labels Phase-Implementation

= Introduction =

The internal representation of NulFuzzyObj are a !JavaScript object that have these :

== properties ==

|| object || JsNulObj || The representation of the object ||
|| knowledge || JsNulKlg || The knowledge restricting the values `object` can take ||

|| minXst || int || The minimum possible fixed values this fuzzy object can take. ||
|| maxXst || int || The maximum possible fixed values this fuzzy object can take. ||
|| fixed || bool || Weither the existence is strictly one ({{{fixed = 1==minXst && 1==maxXst}}}). ||

== methods ==

|| maybe || function(possibles) || Add this fuzzy object to the possibles if it is not empty. ||
|| restrictEq || function(JsNulFuzzyObj) || Creates a new fuzzy object that is a version of this one who can unify to the given one ||
|| restrictEq || function(JsNulObj) || Creates a new fuzzy object containing weither the fixed value given as parameter, either a failure fuzzy object ||
